SELECT max(no) FROM BoardTest
INSERT INTO BoardTestFile (boardno, originName, saveFilePath, storedName, fileSize, contentType) VALUES (#{boardno}, #{originName}, #{saveFilePath}, #{storedName}, #{fileSize}, #{contentType})
mapper.select: SELECT bt.no, bt.title, bt.content, bt.date, btf.originName, btf.storedName, btf.saveFilePath FROM BoardTest bt LEFT JOIN BoardTestFile btf ON bt.no = btf.boardno WHERE bt.no = #{no}
